entry.title: tomi20v/html-trajectory: html-trajectory provides lightweight HTML animations to smoothly "fly" elements from their current position to a target element — for example, animating a product image flying into a shopping cart icon. It’s ideal for parabolic movement, curved animations, and element-to-element transitions.
entry.content: html-trajectory provides lightweight HTML animations to smoothly "fly" elements from their current position to a target element — for example, animating a product image flying into a shopping cart icon. It’s ideal for parabolic movement, curved animations, and element-to-element transitions.
